record.name: Set Status for Logging, Authorization, Closure, Fulfillment Phase

rule.fullDesc: Set Status to 'Open' (when ( Current Phase in CurrentRecord = "Authorization"))

rule.condition: current.phase in $L.file="Review" and status in $L.file="In Progress"
rule.conditionDesc: ( current.phase in CurrentRecord = "Review" AND status in CurrentRecord = "In Progress")
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Current Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Review</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">In Progress</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Set Status to 'Fulfilled' (when ( current.phase in CurrentRecord = "Review" AND status in CurrentRecord = "In Progress"))

rule.condition: same(status in $L.file, NULL) and current.phase in $L.file="Logging"
rule.conditionDesc: ( status in CurrentRecord = NULL AND current.phase in CurrentRecord = "Logging")
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Current Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Logging</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Set Status to 'Open' (when ( status in CurrentRecord = NULL AND current.phase in CurrentRecord = "Logging"))

rule.condition: current.phase in $L.file="Fulfillment" and (status in $L.file="Open" or status in $L.file="Fulfilled")
rule.conditionDesc: ( current.phase in CurrentRecord = "Fulfillment" AND ( status in CurrentRecord = "Open" OR status in CurrentRecord = "Fulfilled"))
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="false"><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Current Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">Fulfillment</Value></condition><collection logical="AND" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">Open</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Fulfilled</Value></condition></collection></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Set Status to In Process (when ( current.phase in CurrentRecord = "Fulfillment" AND ( status in CurrentRecord = "Open" OR status in CurrentRecord = "Fulfilled")))
Set Status to Closed (when ( current.phase in CurrentRecord = "Closure"))
